HOME.TITLE: CiteWish: Effortless Citation Management, Powered by Precision
HOME.DESCRIPTION: CiteWish is your all-in-one citation manager. Instantly generate, organize, and export flawless citations in MLA, APA, Chicago, and more. Pay once, cite forever—no subscriptions, no hassle.

TERMS.TITLE: Terms of Service | CiteWish
TERMS.DESCRIPTION: Review the Terms of Service to understand your rights and responsibilities while using CiteWish’s citation tools and features.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy | CiteWish
PRIVACY.DESCRIPTION: Learn how CiteWish collects, uses, and protects your data, and the privacy choices available to you.

ABOUT.TITLE: About | CiteWish
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Discover CiteWish’s mission to simplify academic citation and reference management for students, educators, and researchers worldwide.

DISCOVER.TITLE: Discover | CiteWish
DISCOVER.DESCRIPTION: Explore CiteWish’s robust features—from smart citation generation to multi-format support and seamless export options.

PRICING.TITLE: Pricing | CiteWish
PRICING.DESCRIPTION: Affordable, transparent pricing with lifetime access. CiteWish lets you cite without limits—no monthly fees, ever.

CITE.TITLE: Generate Citations in Any Format | CiteWish
CITE.DESCRIPTION: Quickly create citations in MLA, APA, Chicago, and more. CiteWish ensures formatting accuracy with every reference you generate.
